name: Tetris with Cardcaptor Sakura: Eternal Heart
description:
Tetris is back once again, and this time Sakura Kinomoto and her friends are here to enjoy the classic Russian block puzzle! Play as Sakura, Tomoyo, Shaoran, and more characters as they attempt to seal the Clow Cards to prevent chaos in the world! Clear lines and reveal more cards, and watch for hidden gems in the pieces that contain unspeakable power!

This game is based on the Cardcaptor Sakura anime, and is a Japan only release.
